name: Cantilever Beam with Distributed Load (Mechanics Validation)
description: Classic elasticity problem: cantilever beam, distributed load; analytical solution available
reference_sources: Timoshenko & Gere: Theory of Elastic Stability (analytical formulas)
expected_outputs: Support reaction within 0.1% of analytical (R = qL)
notes: Fundamental validation; if this fails, solver setup is wrong
